timeline.message:

Remove notify trigger

timeline.bodyText: nit: just do , topic notifications: {} as a standalone like the rest so it reads easier
timeline.author: Nana-EC

timeline.bodyText: I believe we current base64 encode the message and running hash. I think that logic is missing from here.
timeline.author: Nana-EC

replies.bodyText: It's not, jackson automatically encodes bytes to base64 string by default.
replies.author: steven-sheehy

timeline.bodyText: 20 may be still low. the longest run I saw in CircleCI run is 27.x secs, so in other PRs it's set to 30.
timeline.author: xin-hedera

replies.bodyText: Sure, will probably remove as it's covered by yours.
replies.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText: The hope was that the performance improvements in this PR would make it 20, but it doesn't seem to be the case.
replies.author: steven-sheehy
